plot outline: Vira is a lonely engineering student at a Pune college.He is smitten by the beauty of his Sr and student council member Anaya but his unable to express his feelings.Anaya is much closer to fellow student Nano,Vira expresses his feeling for Anaya but she rejects him.He then comes across an incomplete project of late professor Shankar Rao titled Phuntroo and creates Anaya using Hologram technology.Vira succeeds but things go hay wire when he tries to give physical transformation to his project.
title: Phuntroo
plot: Vira is a mad genius who is deeply love struck on Anaya. Faced with utter rejection from the love of his life, he creates a breakthrough invention that will cure his loneliness.

Vira is a lonely engineering student at a Pune college.He is smitten by the beauty of his Sr and student council member Anaya but his unable to express his feelings.Anaya is much closer to fellow student Nano,Vira expresses his feeling for Anaya but she rejects him.He then comes across an incomplete project of late professor Shankar Rao titled _Phuntroo_ (qv) and creates Anaya using Hologram technology.Vira succeeds but things go hay wire when he tries to give physical transformation to his project.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
